mapper.select: select bs.sc_no, bs.user_no, bs.title, bs.start_date, bs.end_date, bs.start_time, bs.end_time, bs.repeat_cat, bs.repeat_day, bs.repeat_week, bs.mon, bs.the, bs.wed, bs.thu, bs.fri, bs.sat, bs.sun, bs.write_date from bp_schedule bs where now() between bs.start_date and bs.end_date and bs.delete_date is null
select bs.server_no, bs.user_no, bs.name, bs.ip, bs.os, bs.mac, bs.control_num, bs.dsc from bp_server bs, bp_mgmt_server bms where bms.sc_no = #{sc_no } and bs.server_no = bms.server_no
select bs.server_no, bs.user_no, bs.name, bs.ip, bs.os, bs.loc, bs.mac, bs.control_num, bs.dsc, bs.write_date from bp_server bs order by bs.server_no asc
